jeggings.name: Jeggings
jeggings.description: Leggings with a jean design on them. Features various jegging designs to choose from.

jeggings.name: Unique Leggings
jeggings.description: Leggings with beautiful unique patterns on them that simply cannot be described.

jeggings.name: Cool Short Leggings
jeggings.description: Short leggings with different prints and symbols on them.

jeggings.name: Lion Leggings
jeggings.description: Fierce leggings with a large lion design throughout.

jeggings.name: Short Flower Leggings
jeggings.description: Short leggings with different colors and types of flower prints.

jeggings.name: Sportswear Leggings
jeggings.description: Leggings with different colorful prints and pockets. Good for active wear.

jeggings.name: Dark Bolt Jeggings
jeggings.description: Dark jeggings with shiny gems that come together to form a bolt.

jeggings.name: Leopard Jeggings
jeggings.description: Jeggings with a unique leopard print.
